-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Fast Fourier Transform
--   
--   A pure-haskell implementation of the radix-2 DIT version of the
--   Cooley-Tukey FFT algorithm.
@package pure-fft
@version 0.2.0


-- | A radix-2 DIT version of the Cooley-Tukey FFT algorithm.
module Numeric.FFT

-- | <i>O(n lg n)</i>. A radix-2 DIT (decimation-in-time) version of the
--   Cooley-Tukey FFT algorithm. The length of the input list <i>must</i>
--   be a power of two, or only the prefix of the list of length equal to
--   the largest power of two less than the length of the list will be
--   transformed.
fft :: [Complex Double] -> [Complex Double]
ifft :: [Complex Double] -> [Complex Double]

-- | <i>O(n^2)</i>. The Discrete Fourier Transform.
dft :: [Complex Double] -> [Complex Double]
idft :: [Complex Double] -> [Complex Double]
